CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Padd with border chars
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When you pad with border characters, the border characters are kept when you travel each direction to build the password and then tacked on to the end

ListPreference.android:title: Maximum characters
ListPreference.android:summary: Maximum number of characters for the password will exclude padding characters

ListPreference.android:title: Default starting square
ListPreference.android:summary: Changing the default starting position of the grid will result in a different password being generated for the same text. Useful if you have a password expiration.
